message: Iconic is a new way of thinking about icons, their structure, aesthetic and abilities.
story: Mohammed El Sayed shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: Tour Iconic
caption: useiconic.com
description: Semantic SVG built for creative freedomOur icons arenâ€™t just vector, they are code, SVG to be precise. SVG makes them portable, flexible, and extendable just like the web.Iconic's SVGs are designed with markup in mind. This means that our markup is clean, clear and structured for you to work with.

data.message: Apart from the horrible fact that the name is very hard to google (and competes with the other "Iconic Framework" for mobile development), this looks very awesome!
I really love it because it's svg based which you can take it to a whole new level with the responsive. :-)
